ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10720), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Protocol 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.73 STATIC (CONF:10721)

Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10719)/@code="67537-1" EMS protocol (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10718)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10720), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Protocol 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.73 STATIC (CONF:10721)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Protocol Age Category

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="840678755"/> <code code="67537-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS protocol"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="293234997"/> <entryRelationship> <observation> <code code="23402688"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1163598507"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
